name: Xcellar
description: xCellar is a DeFi protocol powered by the Fawkes Formula, providing untraceable and secure transactions on the blockchain. It's designed to give users complete financial privacy and control over their assets. The Fawkes Formula is our proprietary security protocol that forms the core of xCellar's untraceable transaction system. It utilizes advanced zero-knowledge proofs and cryptographic techniques to ensure complete anonymity.
